properties.areaDesc: Croatan and Roanoke Sounds; Alligator River; Albemarle Sound; S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 30 at 6:04PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
Sustained winds of 15 to 20 kt, with occasional gusts of 25 kt
remain possible across the marine waters north of Oregon Inlet,
including the Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Alligator
River, and the coastal waters. For the coastal waters, a few
crests of 6 feet are possible. Winds are expected to subside in
the next few hours.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should consider avoiding navigating early this evening.

NWSheadline: GUSTY WINDS WILL CONTINUE NORTH OF OREGON INLET THIS AFTERNOON
